data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Yanam, Puducherry, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yanam, Puducherry, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 612 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, help the 612 believers in Yanam to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 54,989 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, help every believer in Yanam, Puducherry, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Brahmin Sholiar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Brahmin Sholiar people know you.
Spirit, encourage the church of Yanam, Puducherry, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 612 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Yanam.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 612 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

location.name: Yanam
